ygData.subject: Re: Tinkering should be like pottery
ygData.msgSnippet: With all due respect, everything  tinkers can make is as useless as fireworks when it comes to price vs what you get, I can buy a riptide spear for way less
ygData.messageBody:
With all due respect, everything tinkers can make is as useless as
fireworks when it comes to price vs what you get, I can buy a riptide spear
for way less than 1500 plat and it does the same thing for me that the
rebreather does. Stalking probes might as well be garbage. people trying to
sell them for 50pp on my server (LOL), I hate the eye of zomm spell
(although it WOULD be fun to have unlimited charges) enough already but why
would anyone pay 10pp for one charge of eye of zomm? that is crazy
